name: Shrek Invasion
description:
Have you ever wanted to destroy shrek..... well now u can?!?!?!?

This Game is a joke.

Controls: 

Wasd to move.

Space to Shoot.

Left Shift to Change vehicle.

How does this game fit the theme???:

the genres i mixed up are racing and shrek. and if you are wondering, yes shrek is a genre... shrek is life.

also:

this game is completly non profit so plz dont sue me dreamworks. i just made this cuz i was bored. This Game Was made for the Mix and Game Jam and this is my fyrst ever game created in unity. i used to use game maker but now i only use game maker for 2d stuff.
